attributes.action: Ensure That The Rights of Society Are Protected Before The Rights Of Any One Individual
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There have been cases in which one individual's right has been protected at the degradation of the rights or discomfort of Society at large.
I submit that the Bill of Human Rights be amended to ensure that Society in general is not compromised.
Surely the good of Society in general must always be foremost.
